name: Geopapurls
tagline: OGC WMS to Geopaparazzi mapurls generator
body:
## Introduction

After having seen all the problems that the creation of a mapurl for WMS services was causing, we decided to create a small service, that would automatically generate mapurls for [Geopaparazzi](http://www.geopaparazzi.eu) for known WMS services.

## The client in geopaparazzi

For geopaparazzi users everything is transparent, the import view has an entry named: MAPURL

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wiki/tanto/geopapurls/img/04_mapurls.png)

Once you enter that menu, you find the services query view:

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wiki/tanto/geopapurls/img/05_mapurls.png)

Here you can define some filter parameters and start the query. 

In the following example case the gps was placed in Italy, so the query returned:

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wiki/tanto/geopapurls/img/06_mapurls.png)

One can then simply download the service, which will install the mapurl inside the system. 
The user is prompted for a custom name to name the service after, else the original name will be used. Since the original name could be duplicated in different services, the prefix "tanto_" will be added in that case.

## Suggest a service

Want to see an open WMS service appearing inside Geopaparazzi? You can suggest us a service to be added. We will be happy to add it. Please use the ["Suggest a new WMS" page](http://mapurls.geopaparazzi.eu/suggest) to do so.

## Problems?

If you experience problems with this service, [please open an issue in the tracker](https://github.com/tanto/geopapurls/issues).
